full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Standing Offer for Integrated Design Management Services
## Tender Title: Standing Offer for Integrated Design Management Services
### Solicitation Number: 30002625
### Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
### Tender Status: Expired
### Tender Type: Request for Standing Offer

## Objective
The objective of this standing offer is to provide General Functional Programming, Interior Design, and Moving Coordination Services on an "as and when requested" basis to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Pacific Region.

## Background
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans - Pacific Region is responsible for the management of various types of facilities in the province of British Columbia, including light stations, MCTS centers, warehouses, helicopter hangers, fishways, cabins, wharves, and other facilities.

## Scope of Work
The requested services will be identified in each call-up, which may include, but are not limited to:

* Capturing functional and technical requirements of required workspaces for interior design development
* Planning and coordinating office space moves

## Security Requirement
This solicitation contains a security requirement.

## Period of Standing Offer
The period of standing offer shall be from the date of award to 5 years (60 months) thereafter.

## Trade Agreements
The requirement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada – Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

## Evaluation Criteria
The standing offer will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contact Information
For inquiries regarding this solicitation, please contact Juan Carlos Villasana at (343) 597-5129 or Juan.VillasanaRodriguez@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

## Documentation
Tender documents are available on the Government of Canada's procurement website, CanadaBuys.
